replies.txt_content:
试试更新下显卡驱动
或回退到一个稳定版

glGenFramebuffers出npe了Using framebuffer objects because Shaders are not available because OpenGL 2.1 is not supported, ARB_shader_objects is not supported, ARB_vertex_shader is not supported, and ARB_fragment_shader is not supported.
VBOs are available because ARB_vertex_buffer_object is supported.
然后显卡会不会有点老?
